name: 冒险村传说（Tales of Legends）
description: To operate a village , adventure -themed games. The game has a wealth of personas and occupation , with freedom to complete the level . Each occupation has it's different skills which can be learned , which requires players to their own exploration .
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
